HomePage.title: Welcome to my portfolio
HomePage.welcome2: and this is my personal portfolio.
HomePage.mainText1: I am 46 years old and live in
HomePage.mainText3: I am an amateur full-stack developer focusing on web application development. I started programming a few years ago when I learned the basics of
HomePage.mainText4: , and gradually became familiar with frameworks such as
HomePage.mainText5: and also with backend technologies like
HomePage.mainText6: Although I don’t have professional experience in web development yet, I am highly motivated and continuously learning new technologies and techniques. My goal is to grow in this field and utilize my skills to create high-quality web applications. I am looking for an opportunity to fully dedicate myself to web development and take my career to the next level.
